detailed_profile.name: Lucy Ann Garcia
detailed_profile.position: Human Resources Executive @ Jar Transportation | Paralegal Certification
detailed_profile.about: Our team at Jar Transportation leverages an Associate of Arts from Moorpark College and a paralegal certification to drive a legally compliant and inclusive workplace culture. With a focus on employee relations and deep HR knowledge, we've optimized our organizational structure, ensuring operational efficiency and adherence to Workman's Compensation laws. Proficiency in Spanish has been pivotal in enhancing company-wide communication, aligning with our strategic goals. Our business acumen, paired with a commitment to employee support, cultivates a dynamic work environment with high employee engagement and a shared vision for excellence.

recommendations: Leslie Serber ‚ÄúI can highly recommend Janet Makepeace and JAR Leadership Coaching. I have had the pleasure of working with Janet for several years and across two organizations. Her deep industry knowledge and keen understanding of not only the executive leadership challenges faced today, but also the impact on our teams is spot on. She is able to get to the root of team dynamics and bring parties together to meet common objectives while championing team diversity. Janet is also able to work well across cultures to ensure that team practices are well understood and embraced to achieve team goals.‚Äù

Stacey Verdino ‚ÄúI am thrilled to recommend Janet Makepeace as an exceptional leadership coach. Over the course of our work together, Janet consistently demonstrated a deep understanding of leadership principles, a keen ability to guide personal growth, and an intuitive approach. What stands out about Janet is her ability to foster a safe, supportive environment that a anyone would feel comfortable exploring for strengths and areas for development. Her coaching style is both strategic and empathetic, allowing individuals and teams to unlock their potential while staying grounded in their personal and corporate values. Janet's tailored approach, which is always based on thoughtful questions and actionable feedback, has been invaluable in helping me personally as well as working with teams with confidence and authenticity. If you're looking for a coach who is not only highly skilled but also deeply invested in you and your personal and professional success as well as your team's, I wholeheartedly recommend Janet. Their expertise in leadership development is second to none, and I am confident she will help you and your team reach new heights in your leadership journey.‚Äù

detailed_profile.name: Lucy Ann Garcia
detailed_profile.position: Human Resources Executive @ Jar Transportation | Paralegal Certification
detailed_profile.about: Our team at Jar Transportation leverages an Associate of Arts from Moorpark College and a paralegal certification to drive a legally compliant and inclusive workplace culture. With a focus on employee relations and deep HR knowledge, we've optimized our organizational structure, ensuring operational efficiency and adherence to Workman's Compensation laws. Proficiency in Spanish has been pivotal in enhancing company-wide communication, aligning with our strategic goals. Our business acumen, paired with a commitment to employee support, cultivates a dynamic work environment with high employee engagement and a shared vision for excellence.

publications.title: Color and Defect Detection in Industry Automation for Real-Time Intelligent Product Sorting.
publications.subtitle: IEEE Xplore
publications.description: This paper presents a real-time object sorting system that classifies objects based on color and detects surface defects in an intelligent manner for multi-purpose application like autonomous vehicles, supply chain, robotics and so on. The proposed system uses state-of-the-art camera module to capture images of objects and processes them through computer vision to classify items based on color and defect status. The captured images are compared against a custom dataset of labeled samples to ensure accuracy. Based on performance metrics, the intelligent CNN algorithm demonstrates superior classification accuracy compared to RFC, especially in complex scenarios. The edge processor module controls sorting mechanism, where servos actuate to direct objects into designated bins based on classification results. The research work illustrates exploring the potential of machine learning algorithm in automated quality assurance, offering scalable, adaptable, and efficient solutions for industrial applications.

patents.title: SUSTAINABLE AUTOMATED CAPSULE SORTER WITH SHELVING AND BINNING
patents.description: The system, powered by a cost-effective Raspberry Pi, utilizes advanced image processing techniques to automate capsule sorting. With the incorporation of the FIFO (First In, First Out) principle, it ensures seamless, orderly, and efficient sorting while maintaining sustainability by eliminating the need for additional electrical hardware or machinery.

projects.title: Development Of CPW Fed Antenna for Sub 6 GHz Applications
projects.description: Designed an innovative wideband antenna using CPW feeding technique for sub 6 GHz applications, resulting in a 20% increase in bandwidth compared to traditional antennas.

projects.title: Efficient Image-Based Text Extraction Using LLaMA 3.2 Vision Model
projects.description: Developed an OCR-based text extraction system using the LLaMA 3.2 11B Vision model, fine-tuned with LoRA for efficiency, and improved accuracy using transfer learning, evaluated via WER and CER.

projects.title: Real-Time Object Sorting by Color and Defect Detection
projects.description: IoT and Machine Learning Project.‚Ä¢ Developed an automated Raspberry Pi system using image processing for capsule color sorting (HSV detection, contour analysis).‚Ä¢ Implemented and trained a machine learning model (CNN and Random Forest) for defect detection with 99.11% accuracy, creating and analyzing a custom dataset to enhance quality control by identifying cracks and irregular shapes.

detailed_profile.name: Manish Murgod
detailed_profile.position: ‚ú¶Product Design @ JAR ‚ú¶ Building intuitive fintech experiences at India‚Äôs #1 savings platform‚ú¶ Featured in ADPList‚Äôs Top 50 Portfolios & Wall of Portfolios ‚ú¶ Softskills Cert. by IIT ROORKEE
detailed_profile.about: I‚Äôm a Product Designer at JAR, India‚Äôs #1 savings platform, where I design experiences that simplify money decisions for millions of users. My work spans onboarding, Instant Save flows, and festive campaigns ‚Äî all aimed at driving trust, engagement, and user retention in fintech. Some highlights from my design journey: ‚ú¶ Instant Save revamp @ JAR ‚Üí Achieved ‚Çπ90K monthly revenue uplift + 630 new transactions/month by redesigning flows and clarifying GST/benefits. ‚ú¶ Festival experience @ JAR ‚Üí Led end-to-end design, driving 25% app launch growth & 61% uplift in transactions. ‚ú¶ Onboarding redesign @ JAR ‚Üí Simplified first-time user journey, boosting user trust, clarity, and activation. ‚ú¶ Featured in ADPList Top 50 Portfolios globally & Wall of Portfolios (2025). ‚ú¶ Recognized among the Top 5% UX Professionals by Pro5.ai. At the core, I believe in turning complexity into clarity ‚Äî using design not just to make products look good, but to make them truly usable, scalable, and human-centered. Expertise: Proficient in Adobe XD, Figma, and other design tools. Strong understanding of UX/UI principles and design thinking methodologies. Passionate about staying updated with the latest design AI trends and technologies.

experience.title: UX Designer / Product Designer
experience.description: During my tenure as a UX/Product Designer at Sinewave Academy since December 2023, I've had the privilege of collaborating with renowned recording studios and esteemed audio professionals. Together, we've embarked on a journey to create custom-tailored plugins that address specific industry needs. Through our collective efforts, we've successfully achieved remarkable results, including a notable 40% increase in workflow efficiency and a significant 30% reduction in production time. These achievements have not only garnered recognition within the industry but have also translated into tangible benefits for users worldwide, saving them thousands of hours.
experience.description_html: During my tenure as a UX/Product Designer at Sinewave Academy since December 2023, I've had the privilege of collaborating with renowned recording studios and esteemed audio professionals. Together, we've embarked on a journey to create custom-tailored plugins that address specific industry needs. Through our collective efforts, we've successfully achieved remarkable results, including a notable 40% increase in workflow efficiency and a significant 30% reduction in production time. These achievements have not only garnered recognition within the industry but have also translated into tangible benefits for users worldwide, saving them thousands of hours.

experience.title: Graphic Designer & Video editor
experience.description:
As a Freelance Graphic Designer, I've had the pleasure of collaborating with a diverse range of clients to bring their visions to life through captivating visual identities and designs. With a keen eye for aesthetics and a passion for creativity, I've crafted compelling branding materials, marketing collateral, and digital assets that effectively communicate each client's unique story and message.


Since September 2021, I've directed and edited promotional videos for SP Events, renowned for hosting several events attended by Prime Minister Modi. Alongside on-spot video shooting, my editing endeavors contributed significantly to a notable 41% increase in engagement. This highlights our collective ability to deliver impactful content tailored to diverse audiences.
experience.description_html:

recommendations: Manish Kumar ‚ÄúI worked with Mitesh for about 2 years at Porter. Porter had been using Kotlin Multiplatform for ios dev. positions.description: - Played a pivotal role in driving growth and operational excellence at NEK, an esteemed jewelry initiative by JAR. - Created G-suite dashboards to enhance analytical capabilities. - Automated dashboards for the Accounts Team, streamlining processes for improved efficiency. - Actively collaborated with vendors, ensuring smooth coordination and timely delivery of weekly audit reports essential for payment settlement. - Handled all supply chain management escalations, effectively resolving issues to maintain seamless operations. - Provided invaluable support to cross-functional teams including Accounts, Marketing, Product, and Growth, fostering synergy and achieving collective goals. - Optimized post-order flow during peak periods. - Facilitated product listings on various marketplaces, contributing significantly to organizational success. - Created standard operating procedures (SOPs) for projects such as Single Order ID with Different SKUs and Automated Invoicing, ensuring consistency and efficiency across initiatives. - Maintained a risk register, identifying and mitigating potential risks to safeguard the organization's interests and ensure smooth project execution.

At JAR Education, we are committed to equipping this generation of students with the tools and know how, to practically apply their talents and reach new horizons.


The JAR Education Drone Integration Program is integrated into current approved syllabus, ensuring that every learning experience is curriculum aligned - bringing theory and practice together in classrooms by focusing on the development of skills such a design, hardware, software, coding, robotics and automation.


The program can be condensed into bite-size one-day workshops, and come with our very own "Build to Fly" Education Drone Kits.


At JAR, we also have the capability of providing training for the CASA accredited (RePL) Drone Piloting Licence.

positions.subtitle: Jar
positions.description: - Played a pivotal role in driving growth and operational excellence at NEK, an esteemed jewelry initiative by JAR. - Created G-suite dashboards to enhance analytical capabilities. - Automated dashboards for the Accounts Team, streamlining processes for improved efficiency. - Actively collaborated with vendors, ensuring smooth coordination and timely delivery of weekly audit reports essential for payment settlement. - Handled all supply chain management escalations, effectively resolving issues to maintain seamless operations. - Provided invaluable support to cross-functional teams including Accounts, Marketing, Product, and Growth, fostering synergy and achieving collective goals. - Optimized post-order flow during peak periods. - Facilitated product listings on various marketplaces, contributing significantly to organizational success. - Created standard operating procedures (SOPs) for projects such as Single Order ID with Different SKUs and Automated Invoicing, ensuring consistency and efficiency across initiatives. - Maintained a risk register, identifying and mitigating potential risks to safeguard the organization's interests and ensure smooth project execution.

detailed_profile.name: Lucy Ann Garcia
detailed_profile.position: Human Resources Executive @ Jar Transportation | Paralegal Certification
detailed_profile.about: Our team at Jar Transportation leverages an Associate of Arts from Moorpark College and a paralegal certification to drive a legally compliant and inclusive workplace culture. With a focus on employee relations and deep HR knowledge, we've optimized our organizational structure, ensuring operational efficiency and adherence to Workman's Compensation laws. Proficiency in Spanish has been pivotal in enhancing company-wide communication, aligning with our strategic goals. Our business acumen, paired with a commitment to employee support, cultivates a dynamic work environment with high employee engagement and a shared vision for excellence.

experience.title: UX Designer / Product Designer
experience.description: During my tenure as a UX/Product Designer at Sinewave Academy since December 2023, I've had the privilege of collaborating with renowned recording studios and esteemed audio professionals. Together, we've embarked on a journey to create custom-tailored plugins that address specific industry needs. Through our collective efforts, we've successfully achieved remarkable results, including a notable 40% increase in workflow efficiency and a significant 30% reduction in production time. These achievements have not only garnered recognition within the industry but have also translated into tangible benefits for users worldwide, saving them thousands of hours.

publications.title: Color and Defect Detection in Industry Automation for Real-Time Intelligent Product Sorting.
publications.subtitle: IEEE Xplore
publications.description: This paper presents a real-time object sorting system that classifies objects based on color and detects surface defects in an intelligent manner for multi-purpose application like autonomous vehicles, supply chain, robotics and so on. The proposed system uses state-of-the-art camera module to capture images of objects and processes them through computer vision to classify items based on color and defect status. The captured images are compared against a custom dataset of labeled samples to ensure accuracy. Based on performance metrics, the intelligent CNN algorithm demonstrates superior classification accuracy compared to RFC, especially in complex scenarios. The edge processor module controls sorting mechanism, where servos actuate to direct objects into designated bins based on classification results. The research work illustrates exploring the potential of machine learning algorithm in automated quality assurance, offering scalable, adaptable, and efficient solutions for industrial applications.

patents.title: SUSTAINABLE AUTOMATED CAPSULE SORTER WITH SHELVING AND BINNING
patents.description: The system, powered by a cost-effective Raspberry Pi, utilizes advanced image processing techniques to automate capsule sorting. With the incorporation of the FIFO (First In, First Out) principle, it ensures seamless, orderly, and efficient sorting while maintaining sustainability by eliminating the need for additional electrical hardware or machinery.

projects.title: Development Of CPW Fed Antenna for Sub 6 GHz Applications
projects.description: Designed an innovative wideband antenna using CPW feeding technique for sub 6 GHz applications, resulting in a 20% increase in bandwidth compared to traditional antennas.

projects.title: Efficient Image-Based Text Extraction Using LLaMA 3.2 Vision Model
projects.description: Developed an OCR-based text extraction system using the LLaMA 3.2 11B Vision model, fine-tuned with LoRA for efficiency, and improved accuracy using transfer learning, evaluated via WER and CER.

projects.title: Real-Time Object Sorting by Color and Defect Detection
projects.description: IoT and Machine Learning Project.‚Ä¢ Developed an automated Raspberry Pi system using image processing for capsule color sorting (HSV detection, contour analysis).‚Ä¢ Implemented and trained a machine learning model (CNN and Random Forest) for defect detection with 99.11% accuracy, creating and analyzing a custom dataset to enhance quality control by identifying cracks and irregular shapes.

publications.title: Color and Defect Detection in Industry Automation for Real-Time Intelligent Product Sorting.
publications.subtitle: IEEE Xplore
publications.description: This paper presents a real-time object sorting system that classifies objects based on color and detects surface defects in an intelligent manner for multi-purpose application like autonomous vehicles, supply chain, robotics and so on. The proposed system uses state-of-the-art camera module to capture images of objects and processes them through computer vision to classify items based on color and defect status. The captured images are compared against a custom dataset of labeled samples to ensure accuracy. Based on performance metrics, the intelligent CNN algorithm demonstrates superior classification accuracy compared to RFC, especially in complex scenarios. The edge processor module controls sorting mechanism, where servos actuate to direct objects into designated bins based on classification results. The research work illustrates exploring the potential of machine learning algorithm in automated quality assurance, offering scalable, adaptable, and efficient solutions for industrial applications.

patents.title: SUSTAINABLE AUTOMATED CAPSULE SORTER WITH SHELVING AND BINNING
patents.description: The system, powered by a cost-effective Raspberry Pi, utilizes advanced image processing techniques to automate capsule sorting. With the incorporation of the FIFO (First In, First Out) principle, it ensures seamless, orderly, and efficient sorting while maintaining sustainability by eliminating the need for additional electrical hardware or machinery.

projects.title: Development Of CPW Fed Antenna for Sub 6 GHz Applications
projects.description: Designed an innovative wideband antenna using CPW feeding technique for sub 6 GHz applications, resulting in a 20% increase in bandwidth compared to traditional antennas.

projects.title: Efficient Image-Based Text Extraction Using LLaMA 3.2 Vision Model
projects.description: Developed an OCR-based text extraction system using the LLaMA 3.2 11B Vision model, fine-tuned with LoRA for efficiency, and improved accuracy using transfer learning, evaluated via WER and CER.

projects.title: Real-Time Object Sorting by Color and Defect Detection
projects.description: IoT and Machine Learning Project.‚Ä¢ Developed an automated Raspberry Pi system using image processing for capsule color sorting (HSV detection, contour analysis).‚Ä¢ Implemented and trained a machine learning model (CNN and Random Forest) for defect detection with 99.11% accuracy, creating and analyzing a custom dataset to enhance quality control by identifying cracks and irregular shapes.

Solid background in leading and training cross-functional teams in various programs to integrate all efforts regarding creation and execution of new advertisement techniques / campaigns. Focus on prospecting, forecasting and pipeline management.

Build relationships and create opportunities through participation in QBR's (quarterly business reviews) and collaboration with our customers upper management teams and executive contacts. Work with inside and field teams on larger opportunities to make sure we are as aggressive as possible but still profitable. Liaise with leaders throughout the company to discuss areas that need improvement and propose solutions. publications.title: Color and Defect Detection in Industry Automation for Real-Time Intelligent Product Sorting.
publications.subtitle: IEEE Xplore
publications.description: This paper presents a real-time object sorting system that classifies objects based on color and detects surface defects in an intelligent manner for multi-purpose application like autonomous vehicles, supply chain, robotics and so on. The proposed system uses state-of-the-art camera module to capture images of objects and processes them through computer vision to classify items based on color and defect status. The captured images are compared against a custom dataset of labeled samples to ensure accuracy. Based on performance metrics, the intelligent CNN algorithm demonstrates superior classification accuracy compared to RFC, especially in complex scenarios. The edge processor module controls sorting mechanism, where servos actuate to direct objects into designated bins based on classification results. The research work illustrates exploring the potential of machine learning algorithm in automated quality assurance, offering scalable, adaptable, and efficient solutions for industrial applications.

patents.title: SUSTAINABLE AUTOMATED CAPSULE SORTER WITH SHELVING AND BINNING
patents.description: The system, powered by a cost-effective Raspberry Pi, utilizes advanced image processing techniques to automate capsule sorting. With the incorporation of the FIFO (First In, First Out) principle, it ensures seamless, orderly, and efficient sorting while maintaining sustainability by eliminating the need for additional electrical hardware or machinery.

projects.title: Development Of CPW Fed Antenna for Sub 6 GHz Applications
projects.description: Designed an innovative wideband antenna using CPW feeding technique for sub 6 GHz applications, resulting in a 20% increase in bandwidth compared to traditional antennas.

projects.title: Efficient Image-Based Text Extraction Using LLaMA 3.2 Vision Model
projects.description: Developed an OCR-based text extraction system using the LLaMA 3.2 11B Vision model, fine-tuned with LoRA for efficiency, and improved accuracy using transfer learning, evaluated via WER and CER.

projects.title: Real-Time Object Sorting by Color and Defect Detection
projects.description: IoT and Machine Learning Project.‚Ä¢ Developed an automated Raspberry Pi system using image processing for capsule color sorting (HSV detection, contour analysis).‚Ä¢ Implemented and trained a machine learning model (CNN and Random Forest) for defect detection with 99.11% accuracy, creating and analyzing a custom dataset to enhance quality control by identifying cracks and irregular shapes.

publications.title: Color and Defect Detection in Industry Automation for Real-Time Intelligent Product Sorting.
publications.subtitle: IEEE Xplore
publications.description: This paper presents a real-time object sorting system that classifies objects based on color and detects surface defects in an intelligent manner for multi-purpose application like autonomous vehicles, supply chain, robotics and so on. The proposed system uses state-of-the-art camera module to capture images of objects and processes them through computer vision to classify items based on color and defect status. The captured images are compared against a custom dataset of labeled samples to ensure accuracy. Based on performance metrics, the intelligent CNN algorithm demonstrates superior classification accuracy compared to RFC, especially in complex scenarios. The edge processor module controls sorting mechanism, where servos actuate to direct objects into designated bins based on classification results. The research work illustrates exploring the potential of machine learning algorithm in automated quality assurance, offering scalable, adaptable, and efficient solutions for industrial applications.

patents.title: SUSTAINABLE AUTOMATED CAPSULE SORTER WITH SHELVING AND BINNING
patents.description: The system, powered by a cost-effective Raspberry Pi, utilizes advanced image processing techniques to automate capsule sorting. With the incorporation of the FIFO (First In, First Out) principle, it ensures seamless, orderly, and efficient sorting while maintaining sustainability by eliminating the need for additional electrical hardware or machinery.

projects.title: Development Of CPW Fed Antenna for Sub 6 GHz Applications
projects.description: Designed an innovative wideband antenna using CPW feeding technique for sub 6 GHz applications, resulting in a 20% increase in bandwidth compared to traditional antennas.

projects.title: Efficient Image-Based Text Extraction Using LLaMA 3.2 Vision Model
projects.description: Developed an OCR-based text extraction system using the LLaMA 3.2 11B Vision model, fine-tuned with LoRA for efficiency, and improved accuracy using transfer learning, evaluated via WER and CER.

projects.title: Real-Time Object Sorting by Color and Defect Detection
projects.description: IoT and Machine Learning Project.‚Ä¢ Developed an automated Raspberry Pi system using image processing for capsule color sorting (HSV detection, contour analysis).‚Ä¢ Implemented and trained a machine learning model (CNN and Random Forest) for defect detection with 99.11% accuracy, creating and analyzing a custom dataset to enhance quality control by identifying cracks and irregular shapes.

recommendations: Yesenia Cisneros ‚ÄúAlexander started off as our team admin, but then over time, quickly made his way into production - where his true passion lies. With no prior game development experience, he quickly ramped up on the team and delivered results. Within a matter of weeks, he was driving large initiatives across cross-functional strike teams and quickly gained the trust of the team as a valued leader. His communication and team collaboration come effortlessly to him, and was able to successfully close down milestone deliverables. I set the pins up, and he knocked them all down. Alex is a people first producer while also being able to balance the needs of the project - which is not an easy feat. Any team would be lucky to have him!‚Äù

Greg Stone ‚ÄúI had the pleasure of working with Alexander, who initially joined our team as an administrator. It quickly became clear that his exceptional talent, strong work ethic, and infectiously positive attitude made him a perfect fit for an Associate Producer role. Alex excels in organization, scheduling, and planning, ensuring that projects run smoothly and efficiently. His ability to prioritize tasks and proactively surface issues, along with potential solutions, has been invaluable. He is a natural problem solver, adapting to unforeseen challenges with critical thinking and innovative approaches. Alexander‚Äôs dedication and skills make him an incredible asset to any team.‚Äù

publications.title: Color and Defect Detection in Industry Automation for Real-Time Intelligent Product Sorting.
publications.subtitle: IEEE Xplore
publications.description: This paper presents a real-time object sorting system that classifies objects based on color and detects surface defects in an intelligent manner for multi-purpose application like autonomous vehicles, supply chain, robotics and so on. The proposed system uses state-of-the-art camera module to capture images of objects and processes them through computer vision to classify items based on color and defect status. The captured images are compared against a custom dataset of labeled samples to ensure accuracy. Based on performance metrics, the intelligent CNN algorithm demonstrates superior classification accuracy compared to RFC, especially in complex scenarios. The edge processor module controls sorting mechanism, where servos actuate to direct objects into designated bins based on classification results. The research work illustrates exploring the potential of machine learning algorithm in automated quality assurance, offering scalable, adaptable, and efficient solutions for industrial applications.

patents.title: SUSTAINABLE AUTOMATED CAPSULE SORTER WITH SHELVING AND BINNING
patents.description: The system, powered by a cost-effective Raspberry Pi, utilizes advanced image processing techniques to automate capsule sorting. With the incorporation of the FIFO (First In, First Out) principle, it ensures seamless, orderly, and efficient sorting while maintaining sustainability by eliminating the need for additional electrical hardware or machinery.

projects.title: Development Of CPW Fed Antenna for Sub 6 GHz Applications
projects.description: Designed an innovative wideband antenna using CPW feeding technique for sub 6 GHz applications, resulting in a 20% increase in bandwidth compared to traditional antennas.

projects.title: Efficient Image-Based Text Extraction Using LLaMA 3.2 Vision Model
projects.description: Developed an OCR-based text extraction system using the LLaMA 3.2 11B Vision model, fine-tuned with LoRA for efficiency, and improved accuracy using transfer learning, evaluated via WER and CER.

projects.title: Real-Time Object Sorting by Color and Defect Detection
projects.description: IoT and Machine Learning Project.‚Ä¢ Developed an automated Raspberry Pi system using image processing for capsule color sorting (HSV detection, contour analysis).‚Ä¢ Implemented and trained a machine learning model (CNN and Random Forest) for defect detection with 99.11% accuracy, creating and analyzing a custom dataset to enhance quality control by identifying cracks and irregular shapes.

recommendations: Yesenia Cisneros ‚ÄúAlexander started off as our team admin, but then over time, quickly made his way into production - where his true passion lies. With no prior game development experience, he quickly ramped up on the team and delivered results. Within a matter of weeks, he was driving large initiatives across cross-functional strike teams and quickly gained the trust of the team as a valued leader. His communication and team collaboration come effortlessly to him, and was able to successfully close down milestone deliverables. I set the pins up, and he knocked them all down. Alex is a people first producer while also being able to balance the needs of the project - which is not an easy feat. Any team would be lucky to have him!‚Äù

Greg Stone ‚ÄúI had the pleasure of working with Alexander, who initially joined our team as an administrator. It quickly became clear that his exceptional talent, strong work ethic, and infectiously positive attitude made him a perfect fit for an Associate Producer role. Alex excels in organization, scheduling, and planning, ensuring that projects run smoothly and efficiently. His ability to prioritize tasks and proactively surface issues, along with potential solutions, has been invaluable. He is a natural problem solver, adapting to unforeseen challenges with critical thinking and innovative approaches. Alexander‚Äôs dedication and skills make him an incredible asset to any team.‚Äù

publications.title: Color and Defect Detection in Industry Automation for Real-Time Intelligent Product Sorting.
publications.subtitle: IEEE Xplore
publications.description: This paper presents a real-time object sorting system that classifies objects based on color and detects surface defects in an intelligent manner for multi-purpose application like autonomous vehicles, supply chain, robotics and so on. The proposed system uses state-of-the-art camera module to capture images of objects and processes them through computer vision to classify items based on color and defect status. The captured images are compared against a custom dataset of labeled samples to ensure accuracy. Based on performance metrics, the intelligent CNN algorithm demonstrates superior classification accuracy compared to RFC, especially in complex scenarios. The edge processor module controls sorting mechanism, where servos actuate to direct objects into designated bins based on classification results. The research work illustrates exploring the potential of machine learning algorithm in automated quality assurance, offering scalable, adaptable, and efficient solutions for industrial applications.

patents.title: SUSTAINABLE AUTOMATED CAPSULE SORTER WITH SHELVING AND BINNING
patents.description: The system, powered by a cost-effective Raspberry Pi, utilizes advanced image processing techniques to automate capsule sorting. With the incorporation of the FIFO (First In, First Out) principle, it ensures seamless, orderly, and efficient sorting while maintaining sustainability by eliminating the need for additional electrical hardware or machinery.

projects.title: Development Of CPW Fed Antenna for Sub 6 GHz Applications
projects.description: Designed an innovative wideband antenna using CPW feeding technique for sub 6 GHz applications, resulting in a 20% increase in bandwidth compared to traditional antennas.

projects.title: Efficient Image-Based Text Extraction Using LLaMA 3.2 Vision Model
projects.description: Developed an OCR-based text extraction system using the LLaMA 3.2 11B Vision model, fine-tuned with LoRA for efficiency, and improved accuracy using transfer learning, evaluated via WER and CER.

projects.title: Real-Time Object Sorting by Color and Defect Detection
projects.description: IoT and Machine Learning Project.‚Ä¢ Developed an automated Raspberry Pi system using image processing for capsule color sorting (HSV detection, contour analysis).‚Ä¢ Implemented and trained a machine learning model (CNN and Random Forest) for defect detection with 99.11% accuracy, creating and analyzing a custom dataset to enhance quality control by identifying cracks and irregular shapes.
